This is pretty much TrollStore-only, unless other sideloading software allows you to override current installs without uninstalling as well. If you're on TrollStore, first install and sign into Instagram from the App Store, then force overwrite it with this IPA. If you can't use TrollStore, sign into literally any other sideloaded Instagram IPA with the same bundleID (the default one), and then install this one. I can't guarantee that this will work if you're sideloading, but it's worth a shot. Otherwise, the app will crash on the login screen.If you've used TikTokLRD, imagine that but for Instagram. Features include media saving/sharing/previewing (stories included), show follow status, disable typing status, view DMs anonymously, disable ads, FaceID for account switching, etc.
